courseDetails.title: Getting Started with Cryptocurrency and NFTs - Self Custody
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cryptocurrency NFTs & Self-Custody: Learn to Secure & Manage Your Digital Assets
targetAudiences: this course is suitable for anyone who wants to learn the basics of NFTs and cryptocurrency and how to use self-custody to manage their digital assets. It's designed to be accessible and easy to understand, so no prior knowledge of NFTs or cryptocurrency is required

This course is ideal for artists, musicians, and other creatives who want to learn how to use NFTs to monetize their work, as well as investors and traders who want to learn how to safely manage their digital assets
This course is perfect for anyone interested in getting started with NFTs and cryptocurrency but is not sure where to begin.

This course is designed for beginners who want to learn about the basics of self-custody and how to secure and manage their digital assets. The course is suitable for anyone who wants to understand the risks associated with using and not using self-custody, and the differences between custodial and non-custodial systems. It is also suitable for people who are not familiar with the technical aspects of NFTs and cryptocurrency but want to learn more.
